title: Standard basis (unit vectors)
content: According to Wikipedia ("Standard basis", 16-Mar-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Standard_basis ) "In mathematics, the standard basis (also called natural basis) for a Euclidean space is the set of unit vectors pointing in the direction of the axes of a Cartesian coordinate system.", and ("Unit vector", 16-Mar-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unit_vector ) "In mathematics, a unit vector in a normed vector space is a vector (often a spatial vector) of length 1.". In the following, the term "unit vector" (or more specific "basic unit vector") is used for the (special) unit vectors forming the standard basis of free modules. However, the length of the unit vectors is not considered here, so it is not required to regard normed spaces.

blocks.name: cuvc
blocks.content: Class of basic unit vectors for an explicit free module.
blocks.origin: const class cuvc { unitVec }

df-uvc
blocks.content: ` ( ( R unitVec I ) `` j ) ` is the unit vector in ` ( R freeLMod I ) ` along the ` j ` axis. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-uvc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cuvc, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cv(s1), cmpt(s3, cv(s1), cif(cfv(cur, cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-uvc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ unitVec =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶ if(s3 = s2,(1r ` s0),(0 ` s0)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: uvcfval
blocks.content: Value of the unit-vector generator for a free module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uvcfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cuvc, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cur, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c5))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s1, c6))
  syl5eq(c4, cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), co(c0, cuvc, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, cuvc, c2), cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cuvc, c2, cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), universe, universe, cmpt(s0, cv(hs1), cmpt(s1, cv(hs1), cif(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wceq(cuvc, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cmpt(s0, cv(hs1), cmpt(s1, cv(hs1), cif(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  df-uvc(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cmpt(s0, cv(hs1), cmpt(s1, cv(hs1), cif(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cv(hs1), cmpt(s1, cv(hs1), cif(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  mpteq12dv(s1, cv(hs1), cif(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cif(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  ifeq12d(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), c5, c6, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(cur, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cur)
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), c6, cfv(c0g, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c0g)
  simpl(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  simpr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantl(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), universe))
  mptexg(s0, c2, universe, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, c2, cmpt(s1, c2, cif(c5, c6, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

thm uvcfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c4 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6))))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c0[unitVec]c2)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(1r ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c4 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6)))), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c4 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6)))), d(s0, c6))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c4 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6)))), d(s1, c5))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c4 =(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6)))), d(s1, c6))
  syl5eq(c4, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6))), (c0[unitVec]c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c0[unitVec]c2)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6))), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cuvc, c2, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6))), universe, universe, (s0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0,(1r ` hs0),(0 ` hs0)))), universe, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå), unitVec =(hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0,(1r ` hs0),(0 ` hs0))))))
  df-uvc(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), (s0 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0,(1r ` hs0),(0 ` hs0))))=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, hs1, (s1 ‚àà hs1 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0,(1r ` hs0),(0 ` hs0))), c2, (s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  mpteq12dv(s1, hs1, if(s1 = s0,(1r ` hs0),(0 ` hs0)), c2, if(s1 = s0, c5, c6), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, if(s1 = s0,(1r ` hs0),(0 ` hs0))= if(s1 = s0, c5, c6))
  ifeq12d((1r ` hs0), (0 ` hs0), c5, c6, hs0 = c0, s1 = s0)
  syl6eqr((1r ` hs0), c5, (1r ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cur)
  syl6eqr((0 ` hs0), c6, (0 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c0g)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6)))‚àà ùïå)
  mptexg(s0, c2, universe, (s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s1 = s0, c5, c6))))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: uvcval
blocks.content: Value of a single unit vector in a free module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uvcval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(cfv(c5, c4), cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c4)))))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c0, cuvc, c2))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cur, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c5, c4), cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c4))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), c4), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(cfv(c5, c4), cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), c4)))
  fveq1d(c5, c4, cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  uvcfval(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, c7)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), c4), cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c4)))), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c4))), universe))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c4))), universe))
  mptexg(s0, c2, c3, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c4)))
  fvmptg(hs0, c4, c2, cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c4))), universe, cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  ifbid(c6, c7, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c4))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c4))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm uvcval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c5 ` c4)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = c4, c6, c7)))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c0[unitVec]c2)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(1r ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c7)
} = {
  eqtrd((c5 ` c4), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = c4, c6, c7)), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = hs0, c6, c7)))` c4), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c2, (c5 ` c4)=((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = hs0, c6, c7)))` c4))
  fveq1d(c5, c4, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = hs0, c6, c7))), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  uvcfval(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6, c7)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = hs0, c6, c7)))` c4)=(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = c4, c6, c7)), c4 ‚àà c2, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = c4, c6, c7))‚àà ùïå)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c2)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà c2, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = c4, c6, c7))‚àà ùïå)
  mptexg(s0, c2, c3, if(s0 = c4, c6, c7))
  fvmptg(hs0, c4, c2, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = c4, c6, c7)), universe, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = hs0, c6, c7))), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = hs0, c6, c7)))
  mpteq2dv(s0, c2, if(s0 = hs0, c6, c7), if(s0 = c4, c6, c7), hs0 = c4)
  ifbid(c6, c7, hs0 = c4, s0 = hs0, s0 = c4)
  eqeq2(hs0, c4, s0)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = hs0, c6, c7))))

  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = c4, c6, c7)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: uvcvval

  -| wceq(c6, co(c0, cuvc, c2))

} = {

  fveq1d(cfv(c6, c4), c5, cmpt(hs0, c2, cif(c7, c8, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)))
  uvcval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, c7, c8)
  sylancl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cif(c7, c8, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))), c5), cif(c7, c8, wceq(c5, c4))), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(cif(c7, c8, wceq(c5, c4)), universe))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wcel(c5, c2))
  ifex(c7, c8, wceq(c5, c4))

  fvexi(c8, c0g, c0)

  ifbid(c7, c8, wceq(cv(hs0), c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c5, c4))

  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(c7, c8, wceq(c5, c4)))

  uvcval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, c7, c8)
  sylancl(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)‚àß c5 ‚àà c2), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = c4, c7, c8))` c5)= if(c5 = c4, c7, c8), c5 ‚àà c2, if(c5 = c4, c7, c8)‚àà ùïå)
  simpr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2), c5 ‚àà c2)
  ifex(c7, c8, c5 = c4)

  fvexi(c8, c0g, c0)
  fvmptg(hs0, c5, c2, if(c5 = c4, c7, c8), universe, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = c4, c7, c8)), if(hs0 = c4, c7, c8))

blocks.name: uvcvvcl

  ringidcl(c4, cfv(cur, c4), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cur, c4))
  ring0cl(c4, cfv(c0g, c4), c3)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c4))

  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cmpt(hs1, c1, cif(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(cbs, c0), cmap, c1)), wf(cmpt(hs1, c1, cif(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  fmpttd(hs1, c1, cif(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ad3antrrr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cif(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, c0)))

  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))

  mpan(wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(cmpt(hs1, c1, cif(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), co(cfv(cbs, c0), cmap, c1)), wf(cmpt(hs1, c1, cif(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), c1, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c0), universe))

blocks.content: Any element of a free module can be expressed as a finite linear combination of unit vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2015.)

  neeq1d(cfv(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cv(s0)), c10, cfv(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c3), wceq(cv(s0), c3))

  eqnetrd(cfv(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c3), c10, c0, w0)

  ringridm(c6, c0, c9, cfv(cmulr, c6), cfv(cur, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c6))

  syl(w0, wne(c0, c10), wcel(c0, cdif(c9, csn(c10))))
  eldifsni(c0, c9, c10)
  eldifbd(c3, c11, c7, w0)
  nelss(c3, crab(s0, c7, wne(cfv(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cv(s0)), c10)), c11)
  sseq1d(co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), csupp, c10), c11, crab(s0, c7, wne(cfv(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cv(s0)), c10)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), csupp, c10), crab(s0, c7, wne(cfv(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cv(s0)), c10))), wfn(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c7), wcel(c7, c12), wcel(c10, universe))

  syl2anc(w0, wf(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c7, c9), wcel(c7, c12), wcel(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c8))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c8), wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5))), wcel(cfv(c2, c3), c8))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c5, clmod), wcel(c6, crg), wcel(c7, c12))
  frlmlmod(c6, c7, c12, c5)
  eleqtrd(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), c9, w0)
  eldifad(c0, c9, csn(c10), w0)
  syl5eq(c9, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), cfv(cbs, c6), w0)

  syl2anc(w0, wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c5)), wcel(c6, crg), wcel(c7, c12))
  frlmsca(c6, crg, c7, c12, c5)

  syl2anc(w0, wf(c2, c7, c8), wcel(c6, crg), wcel(c7, c12))
  uvcff(c6, c7, c12, c2, c8, c5)
  eldifad(c3, c7, c11, w0)
  lmodvscl(c5, c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), cfv(c2, c3), c8, c1, cfv(csca, c5))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)))
  frlmbasf(c7, c12, co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c8, c9, c5, c6)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c10, universe))
  fvexi(c10, c0g, c6)
  suppvalfn(s0, co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c7, c12, c10, universe)
  elrab2(s0, co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c4, c8, wss(co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), csupp, c10), c11), wss(co(cv(s0), csupp, c10), c11))
  sseq1d(co(cv(s0), csupp, c10), c11, co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), csupp, c10), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))))
  oveq1(cv(s0), co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), csupp, c10)
  diff.wne.s(s0, cfv(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c3), c10)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c3)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c9)

  elrabd(s0, c3, c7, w0, ((c0[c1](c2 ` c3))` s0)‚â† c10, ((c0[c1](c2 ` c3))` c3)‚â† c10)

  uvcvv1(c2, c3, (1r ` c6), c6, c7, crg, c12, w0)

  eqid((1r ` c6))
  syl(w0, c0 ‚â† c10, c0 ‚àà(c9 \ { c10 }))
  eldifsni(c0, c9, c10)
  eldifbd(c3, c11, c7, w0)
  nelss(c3, { s0 ‚àà c7 |((c0[c1](c2 ` c3))` s0)‚â† c10 }, c11)

  syl3anc(w0, ((c0[c1](c2 ` c3))[supp]c10)= { s0 ‚àà c7 |((c0[c1](c2 ` c3))` s0)‚â† c10 }, (c0[c1](c2 ` c3))[Fn]c7, c7 ‚àà c12, c10 ‚àà ùïå)

  frlmsca(c6, crg, c7, c12, c5)
  ffvelrnd(c2, c3, c8, c7, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c2 : c7 ‚Üí c8), c6 ‚àà Ring, c7 ‚àà c12)
  uvcff(c6, c7, c12, c2, c8, c5)
  eldifad(c3, c7, c11, w0)
  lmodvscl(c5, c0, (Base `(Scalar ` c5)), (c2 ` c3), c8, c1, (Scalar ` c5))
  eqid((Scalar ` c5))
  eqid((Base `(Scalar ` c5)))
  frlmbasf(c7, c12, (c0[c1](c2 ` c3)), c8, c9, c5, c6)
  a1i(w0, c10 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c10, c0g, c6)
  suppvalfn(s0, (c0[c1](c2 ` c3)), c7, c12, c10, universe)
  elrab2(s0, (c0[c1](c2 ` c3)), c4, c8, ((c0[c1](c2 ` c3))[supp]c10)‚äÜ c11, (s0[supp]c10)‚äÜ c11)
  sseq1d((s0[supp]c10), c11, ((c0[c1](c2 ` c3))[supp]c10), s0 =(c0[c1](c2 ` c3)))
  oveq1(s0, (c0[c1](c2 ` c3)), csupp, c10)

blocks.name: frlmsslsp
blocks.content: A subset of a free module obtained by restricting the support set is spanned by the relevant unit vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Feb-2015.) (Revised by AV, 24-Jun-2019.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)

  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(c4, cima(c5, c3)), c6)), diffsc(s0, c4))

  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wf(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), c8))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  ffvelrnd(c5, cv(hs0), c8, c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wf(c5, c1, c8))

  uvcvv0(c5, cv(hs0), cv(s0), c9, c0, c1, crg, c2, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c3))))
  simpll1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c3)))
  simpll2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c3)))

blocks.name: frlmlbs
blocks.content: The unit vectors comprise a basis for a free module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: frlmup1
blocks.content: Any assignment of unit vectors to target vectors can be extended (uniquely) to a homomorphism from a free module to an arbitrary other module on the same base ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: frlmup2
blocks.content: The evaluation map has the intended behavior on the unit vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm frlmup2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c3, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c5, cfrlm, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c9))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(cvsca, c9))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c7, co(c9, cgsu, co(cv(s0), cof(c10), c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c9, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c11))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(csca, c9)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c6, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c5, cuvc, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c10)
  -| diffsc(s0, c11)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)

blocks.content: The range of such an evaluation map is the finite linear combinations of the target vectors and also the span of the target vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Feb-2015.)

  ffnd(c0, c6, c7, w0)

blocks.name: ellspd
blocks.content: The elements of the span of an indexed collection of basic vectors are those vectors which can be written as finite linear combinations of basic vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Feb-2015.) (Revised by AV, 24-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:

thm ellspd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {

} = {

  rnmpt(hs0, s0, (s0 ‚àà(Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3))‚Ü¶(c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2))), (Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3)), (c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2)))
  frlmup3(s0, (s0 ‚àà(Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3))‚Ü¶(c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2))), c1, c2, (c9[freeLMod]c3), c9, c3, (Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3)), c8, c6, c7, universe, w0)
  eqid((Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3)))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà(Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3))‚Ü¶(c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2))))
  a1i(w0, c9 =(Scalar ` c6))
  syl5bb(w0, c0 ‚àà { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3)), hs0 =(c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2)))}, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶]c3),(s0[finSupp]c5 ‚àß c0 =(c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2)))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3)), c0 =(c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2))))
  elab3(hs0, c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3)), hs0 =(c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3)), c0 =(c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2))))

  rexeqdv(s0, (Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3)), { hs0 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶]c3)| hs0[finSupp]c5 }, w0, c0 =(c6[gsum](s0[oF(c7)]c2)))
  eqcomd((Base `(c9[freeLMod]c3)), { hs0 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶]c3)| hs0[finSupp]c5 }, w0)

  eqid((c9[freeLMod]c3))

  diff.hs0.c(universe)

  diff.hs0.c(c4)

blocks.name: elfilspd
blocks.content: Simplified version of ~ ellspd when the spanning set is finite: all linear combinations are then acceptable. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)

thm elfilspd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cima(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, co(c4, cmap, c3), wceq(c0, co(c5, cgsu, co(cv(s0), cof(c6), c2))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clspn, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c8))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(csca, c5))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(c0g, c8))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvsca, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clmod))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(c1, cima(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, co(c4, cmap, c3), wceq(c0, co(c5, cgsu, co(cv(s0), cof(c6), c2)))), wrex(s0, co(c4, cmap, c3), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c9), wceq(c0, co(c5, cgsu, co(cv(s0), cof(c6), c2))))))
  ellspd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c9, c5, c6, c7, c8, w0)
  elexd(c3, cfn, w0)
  rexbidva(s0, co(c4, cmap, c3), w0, wceq(c0, co(c5, cgsu, co(cv(s0), cof(c6), c2))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c9), wceq(c0, co(c5, cgsu, co(cv(s0), cof(c6), c2)))))
  biantrurd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cmap, c3))), wceq(c0, co(c5, cgsu, co(cv(s0), cof(c6), c2))), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c9))
  fdmfifsupp(cv(s0), c9, c3, c4, universe, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cmap, c3))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cmap, c3)), wf(cv(s0), c3, c4))
  elmapi(cv(s0), c4, c3)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cmap, c3)), wcel(c3, cfn))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cmap, c3))), wcel(c9, universe))
  fvexi(c9, c0g, c8)
}
